frontmatter.title: Setting up a new machine
frontmatter.description: As I became to customise my settings more and more, having to setup a new environment wasn't an exciting thing to do anymore.  I not only have to remember to install all of these things that I need, it became also tedius and demanded a large cognitive effort.  Also I got frustated many times because I thought I was all setup until I realised I forgot to install a particular tool. This post shares some things I've leanerd when comes to automating my environment setup.
